[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Compensation-Hero.jpg” alt=”Compensation” title_text=”Compensation Hero” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|on” admin_label=”Contact Bar” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0065a4″ positioning=”fixed” position_origin_f=”bottom_center” z_index=”9999999″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_module=”32067″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”20px” global_colors_info=”{}”]Contact Us [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin_tablet=”||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||35px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”24px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Benefits to Keep You Covered

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Finding the right benefits to support you and your family can be frustrating. And we understand that your needs may vary from your neighbor’s.

Few companies in the industry offer better benefits than Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI). In addition to salary, our drivers receive a benefits package worth more than $22,000 each year. Your health and safety is our #1 priority—so we want you to be covered and protected.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#d8d8d8″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”benefits” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”55%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Benefits Worth More Than $22K

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We’ve got you covered! Right off the bat, you’ll be able to dive into most of Dot’s financial and mental health resources. After 90 days of full-time employment with DTI, you will be eligible to join Dot’s medical, vision, and dental benefits.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_module=”32185″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px|15px|25px|15px|false|false” border_radii=”off|4px|||” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#eaeaea” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/physical_health.svg” alt=”Physical Health” title_text=”Physical Health” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”15%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Physical Health

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”VIEW DETAILS” open_toggle_text_color=”#0082ca” open_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_text_color=”#0082ca” closed_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” open_icon_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” module_class=”et-readmore-toggle” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|700|||||||” title_text_align=”center” title_font_size=”13px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding-left:16%!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Medical & dental plan worth more than $22K
  • Administered by Blue Cross Blue Shield
  • Single or family plans available
  • Participating Provider Option (PPO) or Consumer-Driven Health Plan (CDHP) with Health Savings Account (HSA) options available
  • Annual wellness incentives
  • MDLIVE
  • Family Health Centers
  • FREE biometric screenings with HSA incentive 
  • Prescription drug plan
  • Dental plan that pays for 100% of preventative services
  • Optional vision plan
  • Short– and long-term disability paid for by Dot
  • Life insurance

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ custom_padding=”25px|15px|25px|15px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/mental_health.svg” alt=”Mental Health” title_text=”Mental Health” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”11%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Mental Health

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”VIEW DETAILS” open_toggle_text_color=”#0082ca” open_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_text_color=”#0082ca” closed_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” open_icon_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” module_class=”et-readmore-toggle” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|700|||||||” title_text_align=”center” title_font_size=”13px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding-left:16%!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Employee Assistance Program (EAP)
  • Companywide chaplain program
  • MDLIVE
  • Paid time off
    • Eight paid holidays—your driver may be on the road during the holiday, but they will still receive holiday pay
    • One week vacation after six months of service
    • Two weeks vacation after one year—this may vary based on the schedule your driver chooses
    • Three personal days prorated your first year
    • Five sick days prorated your first year

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px|15px|25px|15px|false|false” border_radii=”off|4px|||” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#eaeaea” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/fin_health.svg” alt=”Financial Health” title_text=”Financial Health” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”15%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Financial Health

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”VIEW DETAILS” open_toggle_text_color=”#0082ca” open_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_text_color=”#0082ca” closed_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” open_icon_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” module_class=”et-readmore-toggle” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|700|||||||” title_text_align=”center” title_font_size=”13px” custom_css_toggle_title=”padding-left:16%!important;” border_width_all=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • 401(k) retirement plan with company match
  • Annual profit-sharing plan
  • Bonuses for achieving department and companywide goals
  • Money Matters financial coaching program

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_id=”length_of_training” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||60px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|||8%|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0%|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”right” custom_padding=”21px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Vacation

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Vacation Amount Duration of Employment
1 Week 6 months
2 Weeks 1 year
3 Weeks 5 years
4 Weeks 12 years
5 Weeks 25 years

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/relax.jpg” alt=”Time to relax – On the beach” title_text=”Time to relax – On the beach” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ module_id=”activity-based_pay” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||60px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/timeoff.jpg” alt=”Holidays, personal time, sick days” title_text=”Holidays, personal time, sick days” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|8%|||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|0%|||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” module_class=”ck-bullet-list” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width_tablet=”100%” width_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”52px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Holidays, Personal Time, & Sick Days

  • 8 paid holidays
  • 3 personal days
  • 5 sick days

Paid time off pay varies depending on your driver job type. Please see your HR manager for more details.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_id=”predictable_home_time” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|||8%|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0%|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_line_height=”2.2em” width_tablet=”100%” width_last_edited=”off|desktop” module_alignment=”right” custom_margin=”58px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Tuition Reimbursement

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width_tablet=”100%” width_last_edited=”off|desktop” module_alignment=”right” custom_margin=”-25px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you’re a new full-time hire who has completed truck driving school within the last two years at a Dot-approved institution, DTI will reimburse you up to $7,000 over a three-year period.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/tuition.jpg” alt=”Tuition Reimbursement” title_text=”Tuition Reimbursement” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Apply Now CTA” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ background_enable_color=”off” global_module=”33908″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0065a4″ min_height=”125px” custom_margin=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Apply-Now@2x.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” height_tablet=”226px” height_phone=”150px” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”25px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”8%||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Apply Today & Discover Your Forever Career

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/dotfoods?r=drivefordot” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Apply Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”13%||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0%||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0%||30px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” animation_style=”bounce” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Need More Information Before You Apply? We’d love to talk to you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0065a4″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”5px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_css_main_element=”font-size:58px!important;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ready to Earn More?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://drivefordot.com/working-at-dti/compensation-and-benefits/” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”17px” button_text_color=”#0082ca” button_bg_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

More About Benefits

excerpt.rendered: Contact Us Benefits to Keep You CoveredFinding the right benefits to support you and your family can be frustrating. And we understand that your needs may vary from your neighbor’s. Few companies in the industry offer better benefits than Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI). In addition to salary, our drivers receive a benefits package worth more […]
